'''1.21.2 Release Candidate 2''' (known as '''1.21.2-rc2''' in the [[launcher]]) is the second and final [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.2]], released on October 21, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-1-21-2-release-candidate-2|title=Minecraft 1.21.2 Release Candidate 2|date=October 21, 2024|website=Minecraft.net}}</ref> which fixes bugs.
